subject: First Shaw at frogorbits.com
msgSnippet: As you may know, I have a blog that started out in Orthodox, but ever since May 2013 I ve been posting in Quikscript. ... I d like to announce that the Frog
messageBody:
As you may know, I have a blog that started out in Orthodox, but ever since May 2013 I've been posting in Quikscript.

Today I'm pleased to announce that the blog's focus will change. Here's an Orthodox adaptation for those who can't read https://www.frogorbits.com/blog/2015/first-shaw/ in a reasonable amount of time:

----------8<-------------
I'd like to announce that the Frog Orbits blog is now moving to an all-Shavian format. In keeping with blog policy, old posts will not be converted.

The move to Shavian will improve the blog in the following ways:

- unification of ·Why and ·Way for better "would you like some cheese with that whine?" rhetorical questions
- absence of txtspeak-presaging abbreviations like "ppl" will speed reading
- moving away from the PUA will improve rendering in IE

It's only the first of April; later this month I'll release ports of King Kong to Shavian.
----------8<-------------

All the best,
Nathan
